text:
Staff Associate
NAEB
April 22, 1960
Dear Ruth:
Thank you for your nice letter of April 18.
I can well imagine how interesting it would be to
work with Dr. McLuhan. And, although I have
never been to Canada, I have always pictured it
as being a wonderful, nostalgic country.
Mr. Coleman's address is 453 Rosewood Avenue,
East Lansing, Michigan.
Very best wishes
